about_the_game:
🚴 Adventures of Deliveryman 🚴

It is a simple and incredibly charming action game about a bike courier, where you can have fun exploring the city on a bicycle and playing with physics. Ride around, knock over pedestrians in your path, grind rails in spectacular slides during your deliveries, or pull off aerial stunts. But the coolest part? You can become a true extreme master, defying the laws of physics and space! Imagine: you do a backflip off a rooftop, land in a slide, and top it all off with a combo that doubles your points!

🏙️ Explore the City's Secrets

The action occurs in an open city full of life: crowds of people are rushing about their business, heading from home to work or the store. Thousands of pedestrians will block your way, making it harder to deliver packages on time. And if the pedestrians aren't enough of an obstacle, beware of villains behind the wheel of cars—they’ll try to knock you down on your route.

Challenge

All tricks can be chained into combos, bringing bonus points. Complete missions, collect upgrade cards, and level up your bike. Upgrades can be installed directly in the garage through a handy menu.

Each delivery takes you to new locations and introduces intriguing citizens. Make choices that shape your path and uncover hidden city mysteries! 🔍💬

🎯 Thrilling Delivery Missions

More than just a delivery job, every mission is a puzzle! Master boosts, jumps, slides, and swerves through city traffic to deliver packages with speed and skill. 💨🛵

But be careful: death in the game is permanent. If you fail, you'll have to start over from the beginning. However, with each attempt, you'll gain new knowledge and experience, allowing you to progress faster and sharpen your skills to perfection.

🔧 Build and Customize Your Ride

Your garage is your sanctuary. Build the ultimate delivery bike from blueprints and unlock cool outfits and accessories to express your style. 🛠️🚴‍♂️

The game spans one intense and action-packed day in the life of a delivery service courier. Are you ready for the challenge? 🚴‍♂️.

name: Adventures of Deliveryman

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10,11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-650 | AMD Phenom II X4 965
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTS 450, 1 GB | AMD Radeon HD 6970, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset

short_description: A fun action game about a bike courier where you can perform stunning tricks, knock over pedestrians, and upgrade your bike. The open city is full of obstacles—from crowds of people to villainous drivers. Permanent death adds adrenaline, while combos and upgrades help you become a true master.
